1:
You proud man, you think that you are strong;\q2 you boast about the trouble that you make for others,
\q1 but God faithfully protects people from you every day.
\q1
2:
All during the day you plan to get rid of others;\q1 what you say is like a sharp blade,
\q2 and you are always deceiving others.


\q1
3:
You like doing what is evil more than you like doing what is good,\q2 and you like telling lies more than you like telling the truth.



\q1
4:
You, the one who says things to deceive people,\q2 you like to say things that hurt people!
\q1
5:
But God will get rid of you forever;\q2 he will grab you and drag you from your home
\q2 and take you away from this world where people are alive.



\q1
6:
When righteous people see that, they will be awestruck,\q2 and they will laugh at what happened to you, and say,
\q1
8:
But I am secure because I worship in God's temple;\q2 I am like a strong green olive tree.
\q1 I trust in God, who faithfully loves us forever.
\q
9:
God, I will always thank you for everything you have done.\q2 I will wait patiently because you are so good,
\q2 especially when I stand before your faithful people.
